title: nartanam seyyEnO
sahitya:
nartanam seyyeno O divya nAmattai pADi shivakAmanai nADi


anupallavi

  sapta svarangaLum dashavidha gamakamum tALamum porundiya jati mati tudittE


caraNam    angam anaittumun anbu muddirai kATTa yAzh kuzhal maddaLam Anandam UTTa
shankara Om satccidAnanda Om enna tAvi en Aviyin pAvana rasam kATTi
